card.name: Rapstablook
card.description: {{KW:TRANSPARENCY}}. Whenever the opponent summons a monster, gain -1 {{ATK}}. At 1 or less {{ATK}}, kill this to deal 3 {{DMG}} to all enemy monsters.

description.now: {{KW:TRANSPARENCY}}. Whenever the opponent summons a monster, gain -1 {{ATK}}. At 1 or less {{ATK}}, kill this to deal 3 {{DMG}} to all enemy monsters.
description.prev: {{KW:TRANSPARENCY}}. Whenever your opponent summons a monster, give it and this -1 {{ATK}}. If this card's {{ATK}} reaches 0, kill this and a random enemy monster.
